caption: We ordered breakfast through Uber Eats from this restaurant. We were excited to get the food because the descriptions and photos looked really good! Unfortunately the delivery took about an hour and 45 minutes. Normally I just contact the courier directly, but Uber Eats informed me that I would need to call the restaurant. I’m not sure if they do their own deliveries, but that could be why. I called for updates twice, and was told that our order had just been received (45 mins into the order) and then called back about 20 minutes later for another update and was told our food had left the restaurant “a long time ago”. We eventually got our food and ate it. But it was cold and not very appetizing. We may give them a other try in the future and hopefully we will have a better experience then.
Best blt sandwich I've had in Years! Bravo Brklyn Bread Cafe.

I've been coming here for years and genuinely enjoy the food, and the employees are always friendly. But after moving to the new location I have had some issues. The service is frequently slow, although there are more employees working. And food orders frequently have the wrong ingredients, or when ordering something with a specific request, the request is not factored in to the order. For example, I order a couple of sandwiches that I like to add bacon to, and always ask for "crispy" bacon. But almost every time the bacon is really undercooked and inedible for me. At the significantly raised prices they are now charging (the chicken pesto with bacon hero is $21!), this is not really acceptable. Overall I like Brooklyn Bread, and want to keep patronizing them, but I hope that they will find a way to more efficiently run the counter, and that they will train their food prep staff to pay more attention to detail.

Loveeee this place! Staff is friendly, I am always greeted with the same wonderful energy! Food is delicious, which is why I recommend this place to friends/colleagues every time it comes to mind. BTW: I pick random meals from the menu every time and I am never disappointed. 😊
First timer and I loved it food awesome and pricing is fair
The food is absolutely amazing. The staff is rude
I love their soft bagels !
Great , very delicious food.

**Ordered takeout during COVID pandemic  Food *The Go-To-Deluxe (Nova lox, cream cheese, red onion, tomato & capers) on plain bagel - good; bagel had softer bread *Tuna De Salud (Genova tuna mashed with avocado, pesto, olive oil, tomato & onion) on a roll - good
Love it, the food is wonderful and even if the food was just ok, I would still go, the people working here are Fantastic!!!

One of the best sandwiches I’ve ever tried in my life, this shop has the quality and freshness you are looking for in every sandwich. And the servers were one of the nicest people and very attentive. I seriously will be coming back for more.
Disappointed to receive rotting spinach on the chicken wrap, more attention to freshness needed. Italian style on hero was good.

Solid sandwich joint. Bagels are pretty great, especially the whole wheat and sesame. So many menu items (which can be overwhelming if you’re not a regular). Portion sizes are huge and you’ll pay a lot less than some of the trendier sandwich shops in the neighborhood.

Whole wheat everything bagel w egg salad and bacon. Wow!One of the best egg salads I’ve had! Bacon is done crispy just like I like it. Must say the bagels are definitely not your traditional bagel. They are crispy and not so doughy on the inside. Pretty light and tasty surprisingly.  I will definitely be coming back to try some other stuff !

This place has a really good menu and sometimes the food and drinks are also really good but I’ve noticed an inconsistency with the quality of the smoothies and juices. This is about the 5th or 6th time I’ve ordered a drink that I’ve had before and it tastes nothing like the first few times. The smoothie has big chunks and a whole different taste. I was looking forward to the pina colada paradise smoothie they have and I’m very disappointed and unsatisfied, this was actually the reason I stopped ordering the fresh juice I used to order because they juice had big chunks and did not taste good at all. Sadly this “hit or miss” quality they have makes me very hesitant about ordering from here.
The bagels here should be called flavored rolls
First time try from this place and it’s awesome 😋
Anytime I'm in New York, it's a must have.  Luckily my friends live within a block from this gem.  A simple bagel with veggie cream cheese and tomato is like heaven here.

Best Tuna Sandwiches in Brooklyn I tried a lot of different sandwiches from all different stores,this Brooklyn Bread has the Best Sanwiches Soups in Brooklyn.Try it then will always come back for more😀
Impressive ++++++++++
(Translated by Google) Really good !!!  (Original) Muito bom mesmo!!!
This spot is the best ... great staff and great food !!!
Outdoor seating with table service at new location.
Bagels are soft like bread... not hard hard bagels. Different than traditional NYC bagels.

Keep this quiet. This might be the best bagel in all of New York. Add the local vibe and fair prices, this can’t be beat. The bagels are sizeable, fresh, and perfectly baked. Don’t miss the French toast bagel toasted with butter. A gem.
New location has terrible service. Slow and disorganized.
I love this place. Second visit, and I have nothing else to say than compliments. Large eating area, even outdoors.

When in the neughborhood I always to stop by at this place to grab breakfast before starting the day visiting the city. The bagles are very good and the cookies arde to die for! I even have them for breakfast! As far as the service is concerned, the first time I was charged an item I did not ask for ( thankfully not expensive at all). I cannot wait to be back again.

Bagel thin, not alot of bagel choices, they put very little in filing like cream cheese, so little, starvation, very expensive, very small amounts, arrogant owner.... Did I say very expensive for bagels.....  I would go up the street to smith and president to bagel spot there, it's big bagels, great filings, very reasonable prices..
Best bagels 🥯 in all of Brooklyn , the lenzo sandwich is amazing ! And last but not least crispiest most perfect cooked bacon !
Do not get a chocolate croissant... So disappointed :(

I was in the area looking for a bagel and I came across this gem. I was going in for a morning breakfast and I had one of the most delicious bagels I’ve had in a long time. Having lived in NY for ever I’m just used to good bagels and pizza but I think that many places have become complacent. This place was lively and full of great energy and it was a easy to tell they take pride in their food via the service and presentation.  They got me in and out with great bagel and if I’m in the area again I’d definitely stop by
Absolutely horrible. They were very racist toward my family and I
Friendly service and a really tasty sandwich.
Amazing place—- food is delicious and high quality. Great and welcoming atmosphere. Definitely check it out and you won’t be disappointed!

I've had various things from this place, and needless to say, the quality is very fresh and superb! I love the grilled chicken in sandwich form, but in a wrap is delicious. It has the smokiness flavour grilled chicken is supposed to have, but many places do it artificially. The chicken parm is great as well. Their ingredients like: sliced cucumber, caramelized onions, the mozzarella, and the feta! I also like the tutti frutti sandwhich (turkey, greens, grapes etc— rlly weird but nice!) ALSO, get their cookies.

Remember this place when it was on 5th Ave in Park slope and they had white toast, french fries and I just visited recently and they removed the white toast and french fries from the menu. The customer service and pancakes are great but I definitely had to remove two stars because they didn't have french fries and my son and I love having french fries with our Brunch.

My manager recommended this place & omg. Great customer service, huge fresh bagels. just great for the most part. I got a red velvet muffin that wasn’t so good but still, the bagel makes up for it. Plus, check out the Biggie’ sign!!! Def coming back

I’m a bagel fanatic, I went there with my wife and we fell in love with their sandwiches. The bagels are very light and refreshing and delicious. I don’t mean to stereotype but those 2 Jewish boys that own the place sure know how to make damn great bagel.

I stopped in here to grab a lightly toasted sesame bagel with cream cheese and they did not disappoint! Each bite was amazing and so was the iced latte. I loved the chocolate chip cookie as well - so delicious! Very cute outdoor area, must try!

(Translated by Google) I love your rolls! They are always wonderfully baked !! Keep it up! Handsome seller! I recommend from Bujaków !! Poland is the best  (Original) Kocham wasze bułeczki! Są zawsze cudownie wypieczone!! Oby tak dalej! Handsome sprzedawcy! Polecam z Bujakowa!! Poland is the best
Great service, kind staff, and knowledgeable of their menu. Best bagel in Brooklyn. Highly recommend!

This place is very clean. The staff is always friendly and attentive. I tried the spicy tuna on a garlic bagel and it was by far one of the best bagels I've had. The bagels are not too thick and just the perfect size. They have so many options from bagels and sandwiches to freshly baked goods and fresh juices. You must give it a try.

Love this place , the  Tuna Bella sandwich was the best sandwich I've had in years ,  staff was friendly as well . Went back a second time , tried the "Lucky Luciano" , it was unreal. The prociutto , mozz, basil perfectly side by side , melts in your mouth , not in your hand . Highly recommend.
Great menu and well executed food. Good almond milk cappuccino. Patio is really nice. Service was a little slow on a Saturday morning but the staff was very friendly.

Went here this morning for the first time, I like the outdoor seating, but there were crumbs all over the place.  service - was ok... the clerk was nice, but didn't seem to listen very well,  seemed. They seem flustered with 3-4 orders with a max of two people on a given order. e.g. The clerk whom serviced me had asked her colleague to open up her register... there was 3 girl working the counter; the coffee did come quick so that was nice.  Food -  was good?, but It took 15 - 20 minutes (2 items) and my order came out wrong... I did notice that someone new was being trained; the head cook acknowledged that the food was late and I took them about 5 min to get it out, so that's a plus. However, the interaction seem more unfriendly on the cooks part, they kept repeating "it's coming out soon " which I didn't ask, and repeating it when someone just wait seem more rude than polite.  atmosphere - 1 service - 1/4 cleanliness - 0 food - 1 value for money - 3/4
Want to get a great sandwich and cup of coffee this is the place to go . Really great staff as well .
First time at this place and have to say it is quite impressive. Everything looked so fresh, we had to have a second breakfast.

I never visited the old location but when i decided to take the leap of faith and visit the new BK BREAD that opened on the corner of 1st place and court st, I was pleasantly shocked. GREAT JOB:  Hands down the Best Sandwich I ever tried. Im pretty sure its the bread they use to put the ingrediants on that made my eating experience so memorable . BTW I ordered the #10 (The Dimi) on the menu. I know they just opened up but i waited a little to long for this delicious surprise. It was worth the wait. You just made a regular out of me to bad it wasnt earlier. Word of advise BK BREAD start doing pickup orders.
GREAT place, I love the new location, great food and everything is so pretty! Highly recommended!
I love their new location. Food and coffee really good. Highly recommended.

If you like your bagel with flies and roches this is the place for you!. It's NY I get it, but when you have roaches walking across your counter in broad daylight while the workers are constantly working on that counter you have a serious infestation - I can't imagine what the basement where the food is prepped looks like - never again!
DISGUSTING! Just ordered from this place and saw a  cockroach on the table next to the  cashier and flys on the bagels. I highly recommend not to go there

Best fresh baked bagels with some special bagels (think french toast which is my favorite, and chocolate) amazing luncheon sandwiches and salads. A little pricey but with high quality ingredients and smoothies to die for it's worth every penny!
I ordered a breakfast meal and was pleasantly surprise to the quality and presentation when delivered.Everything was delicious!Will definitely order again!
O.M.G. It does not get better than this.  The coffee is perfect, the bagels are amazing, so are their lunch wraps.  This place is a gem!!!
Favorite bagels in NY

They may not be your average New York bagels, but their homemade bagels and cream cheeses are the best in the neighborhood. A thinner, toasted everything bagel that's not too chewy, and fresh, delicious scallion cream cheese is one of my favorite things to eat- and I grew up in this neighborhood.  The other sandwiches are great, but so overpriced I can't justify it.  CASH ONLY, and their ATM fee is high, so get cash back from CVS up the block before coming in.
Very nice and fresh. The white  dude very friendly and professional.  I love the sandwich he make me. I will come back from  now on to this place
Excellent neighborhood bagels, sandwiches,  minimal seating
Great sandwich but they got my order completely wrong so 2 stars
Love this place!!!!
Neighborhood favorite. Dine-in and delivery are on point.
They have awesome bagels!!!
SO GOOD ! Love ordering from here, everything taste fresh

DA BOMB! Just got an everything bagel, scooped out, super toasted, butter, and cheddar. It was the best thing I've ever tasted. I keep thinking about it. I'm planning the next time I can go there and get it. Hopefully some time next week, as you dont wanna over do it and get sick of it. But I dont think I could ever get sick of it.
Great sandwiches quick and reasonably priced
Been coming here for years. Very clean and great atmosphere, food is beyond amazing! Employees are so polite and service is fast

Food and service are ok but it's cash only and their ATM took $20 off of me without dispensing cash.. just saying like - oh yeah we usually have a guy come fill it - really? I thought it grew money. Then ofc they ran my card like they could've in the first place, meaning I'm down another $10. No comp, no giftcard, nothing. Really unfortunate way to start a morning commute.
The Best B.A.L.T and for $5 I’m in love!!!
Best egg and cheese sandwich in the city.  It's all in the bread.
Love the staff and the food is always on point. Can't go wrong with their grilled chicken broccoli rabbe sandwich.
Recommend french toast bagel
Delicious bread ......and sandwiches
Ice coffee and juices are great!
Awsome sandwiches

Great food, no-frills atmosphere. I order the BALT religiously, it's out of this world. The bagels are not true bagels, they are really bread that's been baked in the shape of a bagel - but they have a nice softness and are not as thick as a regular bagel, so you get more of the sandwich/filling.  The workers are really nice, too! Albeit sometimes somewhat inattentive.
Love their sandwiches and my favorites French toast bagels.
Fantastic! Cash only. Good prices and great food. Recently renovated. And the people who work there are very nice.
Love this place!  They have it all; from French toast bagels to chicken parm sandwiches to bacon egg and cheese on a roll.  Good coffee as well. Highly recommend.
Not traditional bagels. Different. You either like them or you don't.
Best bagels and sandwiches in the city.
(Translated by Google) Always fresh coffee and delicious sandwiches !!!  (Original) Cafe siempre fresco y los sandwiches deliciosos!!!

A real old school Brooklyn place serving excellent bagels made on premises. They also have lunch and a small bakery section but the bagels really are the shining star. Not the best coffee though so get a take out coffee at Black Gold down the block and come here for the bagels and the atmosphere.
The bagels here, amazing texture, chewy and soft.
Excellent food, small place and when they leave the door open it gets cold but it is worth it

I stumbled in and fell in love. The French toast bagel is RIDICULOUS! Also, my #26 sandwich was awesome. Super nice staff and all the authenticity of a local sandwich shop - with the buzz of local kids after school. Two thumbs up!

Normally,  I love this place and have always recommend it!! The last time I went, it was ok! But yesterday,  VERY DISAPPOINTED!! First,  I ordered the salad w/Veggies and cheeses #70, I was given #73, Tuna De Salad! I bring it back,  the guy is telling me,  no,  you ordered #73!! He did change it,  but that's NOT THE POINT!! Then, they give me the same bread that was sitting  on top of the tuna that I DIDN'T want!! The salad itself,, disappointing,, roasted peppers FROM A JAR!! And SLICED CHEESES CUT INTO LONG STRIPS! UGH! PLUS,, SOME OF THE SALAD LOOKED LIKE IT WAS FROM THE BOTTOM OF THE BAG😝😝😝,, NOT ACCEPTABLE FOR AN $11 SALAD!!  He also got another customers order wrong!! WON'T BE GOING BACK THERE!! WHAT HAPPENED TO THIS PLACE???
I love this place. I come here almost every day, and with great prices and even better quality this cafe only gets better every time.
Awesome sandwich shop

The staff here is so-so...sometimes i have to tell them what i want three times before they get it correct and i usually only order a hot black coffee.  the place also has some riggity raggity hours...sometimes it is open in the morning around 6am...other times it is pitch black when i walk by on my way to the subway.  the ventilation is lacking as well...but let me stop with the complaints.
One thing there that everyone in Carroll Gardens knows and loves -- the FRENCH TOAST BAGELS! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED! They are best toasted with some butter = HEAVEN :)
Cash-only.  A bit crazy in the mornings.  Bagels are good.
Get the French toast bagel. It's pretty good! However, place is cash only and can be a long wait.
Sub par bagels and breakfast sandwiches. Long wait for a lukewarm sandwich.

This is one of my favorite breakfast spots in Carroll Gardens. Their bread and bagels are great. For someone looking for a traditional New York-style bagel, you will be disappointed, but if you have an open mind, you will fall in love. The bagel is big, flatter than usual, and really tasty. Everything is baked in the basement. It's a small space, but you can usually find a seat. My wife and I can usually split a breakfast sandwich because they are so big. I can also attest that their lemon drop cookies are very good. Note that it is cash only.

Other folks like this place more that I do, but in a pinch it's a good spot to grab a loaf of bread, sandwich or cookies. This neighborhood has an embarrassment of ridiculously good bakeries, and I'm just not sure this one is on par with the others, but it would probably be a standout in another 'hood.

What I love most about Brooklyn Bread is that it's a go-to bakery for almost anything I'd need. It's a great spot to pick up a sandwich for lunch or dinner (they're hearty sandwiches too, and reasonably priced), bakery-quality cookies if you're craving something sweet, or a cake or pie if you're entertaining guests. I wish they had kept their Park Slope location, but worth the walk over to Carroll Gardens for one of their delicious bagels.
Fresh flavorful massive sandwiches. Love the chicken, pesto, and fresh mozzarella sandwich. Recommend going with a friend and splitting one since they're huge. Around $10-11, but worth it.

Ok so here is the deal. Everything here tastes amazing. The bread used for sandwiches? Out of Control. The Bagels? throw an egg and some cheese on one and I am a happy girl. The staff? They try. They aren't rude per se, but the turnover is so high that they aren't in a position most times to make much in the way of pleasantries. Grab a  paper menu, decide what you would like then get in line. Order  and then move away from the counter, the cashier isn't the one making the food so you mess with the flow by setting up shop at the counter after you order. The prices are great and the Sandwich selection can keep you in new options for months.
One of the best bagels I've ever had- hands down. They're bigger and lighter than your average bagel, and they are delicious.
